Desc.entry: Activities include youth club, older people's club, kiddies corner, bingo and flower arranging. Holds meetings for SRB5, crime and disorder, tenants and police meetings. Organises Easter party, trips, games knockouts, and a Christmas party. A registered charity.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: 1st Mon in the month 7.30-9.30pm (General Committee Meeting), last Thurs in the month at 8pm (Bar Committee Meeting)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
